# unifi_ap_group (Resource)

Manages a UniFi access point group.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "unifi_ap_group" "all_aps" {
  name         = "All Access Points"
  for_wlanconf = true # Required for use with Wireless Networks (SSIDs)
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the AP group.

### Optional

- `device_macs` (List of String) The MAC addresses of the devices in the AP group.
- `for_wlanconf` (Boolean) Whether the AP group is used for WLAN configuration.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of the AP group.
